attributes.action: Cancel New Years Eve Fireworks by The Mayor of London
attributes.additional_details:
A petition to lobby for the cancelling of the London NYE Fireworks by the Mayor of London. That this money is reinvested into charities, school, health, disaster or overseas aid.

With London, England setting a precedent, the rest of the United Kingdon should follow and hopefully the world. With world leaders seeing the amount of money wasted on these events. The amount of change that could be brought about through these changes it would be silly not to. Better value for money. More economically viable.
